description._content: Description: A Butcher slaughtering a sheep for the use of the hospital in Taiz Location: Taiz, Yemen Date: 1952 Description: The Reception-House and the Crown-Prince's Palace east of Taiz Location: Taiz, Yemen Date: 1952 Our Catalogue Reference: Part of CO 1069/677 This image is part of the Colonial Office photographic collection held at The National Archives. Feel free to share it within the spirit of the Commons Please use the comments section below the pictures to share any information you have about the people, places or events shown. We have attempted to provide place information for the images automatically but our software may not have found the correct location. For high quality reproductions of any item from our collection please contact our image library
